headline: MultiCloud... flare
keywords: Serverless, Cloudflare Workers, Load Balancing, Cloudflare Access, Speed & Reliability, Cloudflare Tunnel
description: If you want to start an intense conversation in the halls of Cloudflare, try describing us as a "CDN". CDNs don't generally provide you with Load Balancing, they don't allow you to deploy Serverless Applications, and they certainly don't get installed onto your phone.
